sentences.sContent: Their relationship hasn’t always been amicable.
sentences.sCn: 他们的关系不是一直都很和睦。

remMethod.val: am(是) + i(我) + cable(电缆) → 我是电缆， 友好的通向别人 → 友好的

trans.tranOther: an amicable agreement, relationship etc is one in which people feel friendly towards each other and do not want to quarrel
